page.title: 10Horningtoft Church cont
page.content: There is a table with a book on it for newcomers to put their names and addresses in. The chancel has a stone and wooden floor with a red carpet down the middle.The other kind of organ is on the north side.Each seat is called a pew, it can seat five people on average and there are six rows of pews.The Altar is in the middle of the east side and has creamy curtains round the back and the sides.The cross is in the middle and there are flowers between the cross and the candles, which are lit each service. Every two weeks there are different people to change the flowers and to clean the church.
